summary: Dark Elf & High Elf Follower, 2h/light armor and a mage/light armor
descriptionHtml:
Ok so i wanted to add a few male elven followers to the game. These guys should be kicking around inside the Penitus Oculatus outpost in Dragon Bridge and should both be eligible for marriage.

They use vanilla creation options / warpaints etc so there shouldnt actually be any required mods for them but if you want them to turn out as in the screenshots i was using the following.

Somber Lut ENB http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41465/?
Enhanced Lights & fx http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?
Jethead Armors http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25636/?

I would Recommend using AFT which can be downloaded from here :- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?

This is my first mod so please go easy on it.

Opeth the Dark Elf :- This guys your smash in the door beat it in the face guy, 2 handed ,light armor & sneak.

Tyrion the High Elf :- Touch more cautious Mostly the 4 mage schools and some light armour, comes with sparks , flames , bound sword and s surprise for later levels

Installation should be as simple as extract - copy & paste data folder to skyrim directory :D

All this mod should rely on is the contained .esp and the folders located in the following directories should you want to remove them :-

SkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceTintOpeth & Tyrion Elven Followers.esp
SkyrimDatameshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomOpeth & Tyrion Elven Followers.esp

Version 0.3
Fixed a major issue where they would both stay in the area you dismissed them instead of returning to the outpost.
Also added a version including CaBaL120's amazing elven armor retexture.

Version 0.2
fixed Tyrion so he wouldn't level twice as fast as the player.

Version 0.1
Initial Release

Credits:
Major thanks to CabaL120 for his aMidianborn dark elven re-texture as without it these guys just dont look that badass :D
author: chickenpasties
